text: Eraldo Isidori (17 June 1940 â€“ 16 December 2018) was an Italian politician. He was born in Macerata, Italy. Isidori was a member of the Italian Chamber of Deputies from 2010 to 2012. Isidori was a member of the Lega Nord. Isidori died on 16 December 2018 in Bologna, Italy from complications of surgery, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Isidori interviewed by journalists of Le Iene Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Marche
title: Eraldo Isidori
